body.name: Bumble and Bumble Sunday Shampoo, 8 Ounces
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery on orders over $35 shipped by Amazon.
features: Formulated to restore fullness and sheen by removing build-up
Perfect for product junkies or infrequent washers whose hair needs extra deep-cleaning once in awhile
Works as an excellent preparatory cleanser for chemical processes like coloring and perming
Serves as a weekly detox to banish product build-up, hard water residue, and pollutants
body.description: A deep, weekly cleanser that lifts away product residue and built-up pollutants for more vibrant, healthy-looking hair. Pollutant buildup, hard water minerals, and other residues that can cause lifeless, dull-looking locks.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #24,167 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #739 in Hair Shampoo

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My must have shampoo
reviews.reviewText: My hair dresser told me about this years back. Gentle on hair but it clears all the products and oily hair without leaving it feeling dry or damaged. I like this because it makes my hair feel clean and light weight after each use once per week.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gets Hair Squeaky Clean
reviews.reviewText: My new favorite clarifying shampoo. Removed all traces of product buildup. Excellent degreaser if you have oily scalp. Pleasant scent. Not overwhelming.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Does exactly what it says! Any shampoos that would leave behind residues, I used to use head n shoulders before this one. Ditch whatever you've got cause this one adds volume and you can go longer without having to wash your hair. It doesn't leave your hair flat or feeling oily or heavy, its perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2022
reviews.reviewText: While a little pricey, this shampoo cleans my hair very well and leaves it feeling soft and amazing. It also features a really pleasant scent. It's perfect for removing the build up of other hair products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Extends clean hair!
reviews.reviewText: I have very fine hair that usually gets oily by the end of the day. I've been working towards only washing 2-3 times per week and adding this shampoo has really extended how long I can go between washes. Before my hair would look greasy the next day but with this shampoo, I get an extra day of clean hair. It also somehow helps with my dandruff that I used to get if I didn't wash at least every other day. That goes away using this shampoo. As the bottle says, I wouldn't use it daily and you don't need much for it to work. Would definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for grease control
reviews.reviewText: Have been buying this for a few years. Really helps control the grease. Leaves hair shiny and soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This shampoo completely cleans my hair of residues from other shampoos and conditioners. It’s like pressing the reset button, as I only use it every one or two weeks, between using my other shampoos. I love the way it makes my hair feel and look.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My wash day go to
reviews.reviewText: I have thick, coarse 2b-c hair. I have been using this for my wash day for years, and one bottle lasts me well over 6 months (I wash approx 1/ week). After a couple bottles, I replaced this with a milder clarifying shampoo from a brand that I love, but had more challenges with product build up while I was using the other shampoo. So, I have returned to B&B Sunday Shampoo. My hair is below my shoulders, and I lather a small amount of this in my hands before applying. If I dont get great lather, I repeat with a slightly smaller amount of shampoo for a second wash and then get great lather and feel confident any product build up has been removed.Fun story about Bumble & Bumble, about 30 years ago I visited nyc and saw a photo in a magazine of hair I "wanted." It was a short sleek bob. While the haircut was not at all aligned with my frizzy hair, I saw that Bumble and Bumble was the in the photo credits and thought if anyone could make my hair look that way, they could. Well, it was fate. I called them and due to a cancellation, they had an opening! I confidently presented the photo and the hairdresser kindly informed me that he could give me a short cut, but that it would not look like the photo. That was my first curly cut. While I walked out looking much different that I anticipated, it was the first time I realized my hair wasn't just frizzy- that I actually had curls.

Previously I had tried probably 7 different brands - my hair had been permanently greasy for a year. I would wash my thick hair thoroughly and it would look as if I had never washed it.I have used this once and instantly my hair had no grease. I wash my hair once a week and it holds up!

reviews.reviewTitle: Ottimo per acqua dura e calcarea
reviews.reviewText: L'ho comprato perché ne avevo sentito parlare bene in caso di acqua molto calcarea, e devo dire che non sono rimasta delusa. Lava molto bene i capelli e li lascia leggeri e morbidi. Lo uso almeno una volta a settimana per eliminare tutto l'accumulo di calcare. Consigliato anche se avete i capelli lunghi e ricci, purifica e fa quello che promette.Fa molta schiuma.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Lovely shampoo, really does get rid of product build up.
reviews.reviewText: I have been looking into a better way to manage my curls (I am curl type 2C) and one video suggested using a detox shampoo once a week to reduce product build up.The shampoo has a really gentle fragrance, and you only need a small amount to go through your hair - mins is quite thick and shoulder length.Hair feels almost squeeky clean after using. Definitely a good product if you want to fully cleanse your hair.
Also das Shampoo hält was es versprichtMuss nurnoch ein Mal die Woche Haare waschen.
